title: Haunted Hotel Eternity v1.0.0 full and data
description:
You thought it would be an easy assignment to protect a wealthy philanthropist and collect a nice paycheck. Who would want to harm an innocent, bumbling professor anyway? But when a mysterious sniper takes aim and the bullets start flying, youâ€™re forced to take refuge in the abandoned Eternity Hotel. Once inside, you realize that you may never be allowed to leave!
